attributes.action: New/ Better car park at Belfast Royal Hospital to cope with the demand.
attributes.additional_details: In my opinion I think they should either extend the 2 level multi-story with more floors or locate an area in Belfast to place a vast car park with a shuttle bus running during opening hours to ease congestion around the hospital.
attributes.background: It's always terrible trying to enter Belfast Royal at visiting hours. The car park can only hold a 1/3 of cars trying to visit the hospital, people have to wait 40 mins plus just to get 1 space.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here: 

http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
